attributes.action: pay the full £3bn to complete the Galileo satellite-navigation system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should pay the full £3bn to complete the Galileo satellite-navigation system for a controlling interest in it's operation. As a sign of support for our satellite manufacturing industry and as a wise investment to create jobs in Britain and provide alternatives for many schemes and systems currently reliant on the US’s GPS network.
